description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application called Recipe Explorer. It sets up the root widget 'RecipeApp' which configures the MaterialApp with theme, title, and the initial HomePage.

classes.name: RecipeApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that serves as the root widget of the Recipe Explorer Flutter app. It builds the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the MaterialApp widget, setting the app's title, theme, home page, and disabling the debug banner.
